email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer a revised rate of $48.75 per ton, considering our long-standing relationship. The vessel is in excellent condition, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds reasonable. However, could we agree on a demurrage rate of $14,000 per day? Also, please confirm the laytime start and end dates. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to the demurrage rate of $14,000 per day. The laytime will start on 15 October and end on 20 October. Please confirm your acceptance, and I will proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, we accept the terms. Please proceed with the fixture. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, John
